title: üåçinternational
desc: Bitcoin.org is translated into 25 different languages: https://bitcoin.org/en/

msgs.text:
Bitcoin.org is translated into 25 different languages:
https://bitcoin.org/en/

Here are 36 translations of the Bitcoin Whitepaper:
https://bitcoin.org/en/bitcoin-paper

Link to more Bitcoin resources in African languages, Arabic, German, Dutch, Greek, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, and Russian:
https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information/other-resources.html

Bitcoin forum discussion boards in Arabic, Indonesian, Spanish, Chinese, Croatian, German, Greek, Hebrew, French, various Indian, Italian, Japanese, Dutch, Korean, Filipino, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Romanian, Scandinavian, Turkish
https://bitcointalk.org/index.php#5
Bitcoin forum discussions in other languages: 
https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=11.0

Each of Gigi's "21 lessons" contains wonderful information that can help you really understand Bitcoin's value. Translated here in various languages:
https://21lessons.com/translations?s=09

Spanish: Buy bitcoin p2p with Local Bitcoins
https://twitter.com/LocalBitcoinsES

Spanish - (free) book Inventing Bitcoin:
https://event.swanbitcoin.com/librogratis/

Spanish - Guide to setting up a node
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLMXv7Q8W-g8J4IZGJfWMZwVVltONTEaib

Over 50 of the best educational articles about Bitcoin have now been hand-translated to Spanish, thanks to a new crowdsourced project! 
https://bitblioteca.com/

https://www.twitter.com/laBitblioteca

In person (El Salvador) Spanish Bitcoin Education course 
https://miprimerbitcoin.io/en/my-first-bitcoin/

Spanish audio recording - "Why Bitcoin?" by acclaimed Bitcoin writer Tomer Strolight. 28 minutes of invaluable information
https://www.listennotes.com/podcasts/bitcoin-freiheit/23-porque-bitcoin-parte-4-6SoianYCH4E/

Spanish - Estudio Bitcoin es un espacio en espa√±ol con todos los recursos necesarios para empezar y profundizar en Bitcoin. 
https://estudiobitcoin.com/

Spanish - Bitcoin education start up in Venezuela with https://twitter.com/Dubrska_25:
https://www.myval-u.com/

Bitcoin books in a variety of languages:
https://konsensus.network/shop/

German with english subtitles - Human B | Bitcoin Documentary | 
https://vimeo.com/658711759

Portuguese Bitcoin website:
https://bitcoinheiros.com/

Portuguese (mostly) Bitcoin Discord server:
https://discord.gg/UPyNbahqyk

Portuguese book The Bullish Case for Bitcoin -
https://twitter.com/booksbymonstera/status/1505833393539489794?t=4jSsjtgxRPJN_MUzLpPjwQ&s=19

Portuguese - Bitcoin is Generational Wealth - A Bitcoin film
https://youtu.be/FPazcUZbJrU
Nice, straightforward intro guide to Bitcoin. Translated to Spanish, Arabic, Finnish, Italian, Dutch, Suomi, Portuguese, German, Polish

Italian newsletter and Twitter account that runs Twitter spaces in Italian
https://www.btcintheclub.xyz/
https://www.twitter.com/btcintheclub

Three great Italian Bitcoin resources shared by :
https://pindol.medium.com/premessa-1e5254a52475

https://bitcoin-translate.it/

https://github.com/mirserena/risorsebitcoin/blob/main/README.md

Bitcoin site in Arabic
https://bitcoinarabic.org/

Arabic - Layered Money (book):
https://twitter.com/Arabic_hodl/status/1506717700051111937?s=20&t=W8VeMxbGmCDvRhdSa-NmYw

Twitter account:
https://twitter.com/Arabic_hodl

Konsensus Network - books translated into Albanian, Dutch, Finnish, French, Hebrew, Swedish, Portuguese, Czech, English, German, Spanish, Danish
https://konsensus.network/

Many languages: Little Bitcoin Book
https://littlebitcoinbook.com/
Mega thread of Global Bitcoin Fest communities from around the world https://twitter.com/GlobalBTCFest/status/1477025558470877186?s=20
